metadata.name: Greenpill Kenya on Celo ReFi
metadata.description:
Greenpill kenya mision build robust public goods program, opportunity experiment:- positive initiatives that enhance both the individual and community. past work river cleaups, plastic and organic waste collection, Tree planting via seed bombs, vermicomposting and biochar production and creation of a regenhub for impact onboarding, web3 education and a Celo Refi Zone. We plan to incentivize our contributors via Celo/ Cusd also mint hypercerts via Celo chain also hosting Celo events is on the roadmap. check out some of our links here

metadata.name: Greenpill Kenya on Celo ReFi
metadata.description:
Greenpill Kenya mission is to build robust public good program, opportunity experiment- positive initiatives that enhance both the individual and community. past work river clean-ups, plastic and organic waste collection, tree planting via seedbombs, vermicomposting, biochar production and building a Regen Eco Hub.

The Hub will have a Celo Earthing Zone. Impact onboarding is core so we will be incentivizing our contributors via Celo/Cusd minting hypercerts via celo and hosting Celo themed events we are also partnering with Sylvi protocol already building on Celo chain.
